resourcePacks.title: New Carer's Guide to Eldercare
resourcePacks.description: A comprehensive introduction to caring for elderly loved ones, covering basic needs, common challenges, and essential resources to get started.

resourcePacks.title: Legal Rights & Power of Attorney Guide
resourcePacks.description: Understand the legal aspects of elderly care, including power of attorney, guardianship, living wills, and how to navigate the UK legal system.

resourcePacks.title: Financial Support & Benefits Handbook
resourcePacks.description: Complete guide to financial assistance, benefits, and support available to carers and elderly individuals in the UK, including application procedures.

resourcePacks.title: Dementia Care Essentials
resourcePacks.description: Practical strategies for caring for individuals with dementia, including communication techniques, managing behavioral changes, and creating a safe environment.

resourcePacks.title: Nutrition & Meal Planning for Elderly Care
resourcePacks.description: Nutritional guidelines, easy meal planning strategies, and simple recipes designed for elderly individuals with various dietary needs and restrictions.

resourcePacks.title: Home Safety & Accessibility Modifications
resourcePacks.description: Detailed guide to making homes safer for elderly individuals, including room-by-room recommendations, low-cost solutions, and assistive technology options.

resourcePacks.title: Carer Wellbeing & Self-Care Strategies
resourcePacks.description: Essential self-care strategies for carers, including stress management, preventing burnout, finding support networks, and maintaining your own health while caring for others.

resourcePacks.title: End of Life Care Planning Guide
resourcePacks.description: Sensitive and practical information on end-of-life care planning, including palliative care options, hospice services, and emotional support resources for families.
